details.title: 103: Chapter III
details.actor: Tyler Johnston/Tammy Hui/Kyle Labine/James Gerard/Joe Sheridan/Patrick Albenque/Peter Hudson/Susan Gilmore
details.overview: Cal and Liam search for geothermic sources. There is a major accident which forces Cal to remove his gloves despite the -80Â° C temperature, but he suffers no frost bite at all. Both are puzzled by this.
